name: One Way Out (Kai Dev)
description:
He must fight his way out of this jam! That is the only way! The robots have gone haywire and are trying to kill you! You have to put an end to this terror by destroying their king! Your the only one that has what it takes! :D

Hint: The drops near the end are to help with the battle ;)

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • E to drop weapons.
  • Arrow keys to attack.

If you like my game, checkout my other games! If you would like to see more games like this then you can follow me on Twitter.
